description: This 20-minute beef stir-fry is perfect for a weeknight meal. It’s quick, tasty and colourful thanks to the addition of broccolini, carrot and capsicum.
keywords: Beef stir-fry,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Steak & Veg Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g rump steak, trimmed, sliced into strips
2 tbs kecap manus sweet soy sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Place a large wok or large skillet over high heat and add half the oil to pan. Add beef strips and stir-fry for 1 minute, until strips are golden on the outside and still pink in the centre. Transfer to a heat-proof bowl.
Add remaining oil to the pan, along with the carrot, capsicum and Broccolini®. Stir-fry for 3 - 4 minutes. Add onion and cook a further 2 - 3 minutes, until veggies are tender-crisp.
Return beef to the pan, add oyster sauce and kecap manus sweet soy sauce, and toss to coat. Serve stir fry over steamed rice, with spring onions and lemon wedges.
